column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////Hi Kim - Thank you for your review. I'm sorry your Tonkotsu Spicy was lacking spice and flavor. I'm assuming you have a strong tolerance for spicy food because the majority of our customers find the "Spicy" level too hot
column2: while others who order the "Inferno" and "Double Inferno" levels find that level of spiciness just right.
